UsageExternalURIEntities.metric: Existence of links to external data providers
UsageExternalURIEntities.description: Checks whether linked entities in the dataset are linked to external data providers.
UsageExternalURIEntities.metric_calculation: 1 - (Number of violations / Number of triples with INTERLINKING_PROPERTY)

UsageHashURIsEntities.description: Verifies that entity's URIs don't have a hash (#)

LabelForEntities.metric: Human-readable labelling of classes, properties and entities as well as presence of metadata

URIRegexComplianceEntities.metric: Indication of a regular expression that matches the URIs of a dataset
URIRegexComplianceEntities.description: Compliance of URIs in the dataset to the provided regular expression

URIsParametersEntities.description: Verifies that URIs in the dataset don't contain parameters

URIsLengthEntities.description: Verifies that URIs in the dataset have a length of at most 80 characters

ProlixRDFFeatures.metric: No use of prolix RDF features.
ProlixRDFFeatures.description: Verifies there's no usage of RDF prolix features, such as RDF reification, containers and collections.

DifferentLanguagesLabelsEntities.metric: Checking whether the data is available in different languages
DifferentLanguagesLabelsEntities.description: Verifies if entity's labels contain language tags.
DifferentLanguagesLabelsEntities.metric_calculation: 1 - (Number of violations / Number of entities with labels)

DifferentLanguagesDescriptionsEntities.metric: Checking whether the data is available in different languages
DifferentLanguagesDescriptionsEntities.description: Verifies if entity's descriptions contain language tags.
DifferentLanguagesDescriptionsEntities.metric_calculation: 1 - (Number of violations / Number of entities with descriptions)

SelfDescriptiveFormat.description: Verifies if entities in the dataset are identified with URIs.

BlankNodesUsageEntities.description: Verifies that blank nodes aren't used to represent entities in the dataset.

InterlinkingCompleteness.description: Verifies that entities in the dataset are interlinked.
